body:
Hi Lars,

Is it possible to get the details on content/cost etc.. I will be interested in doing.
Best Regards,     Brajesh Lal

Hi Lars,

the workshop this year will be in Freiburg (at the Fraunhofer ISE), Germany.

Cheers,

Jan
